name: Oncolos - A multiplayer game for cancer patients
blurb: A game in which the goal is to defeat various cancers in a fantasy setting. The game will use solo & team based play in a PvE setting.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Get your name in the final credits for the game.  We want everybody to be acknowledged and this seems like the best way to do it.  So if you contribute one dollar or ten thousand dollars your name goes into the credits...

Get an official Oncolos PDF picture of the boss, signed with her own paw!  Yeah she's really cute, but you know how bosses are... so don't wait or she might chew up the picture!  This one comes early and goes to all our backers.  Get a preview by checking out the free wallpaper in Update # 7!

Have your name (or the name of someone you select) etched into the memorial walkway in one of the major capital cities!  Each capital city will have a large park with a memorial area.  In that area on the memorial wall surrounded by brilliant pennants will be the names of all our $5 dollar contributors.

Lucky 7!  You get two great prizes! First, you get early access to the game!!  You will get a special invite to try our end of Alpha Release where you can provide feedback, and say what else you would like to see in the game.  Show it off to your friends!  Second, you get an invitation to the Backers Ball - an in-game party at the end of our Alpha Release where you will be allowed to create your own character for use in the game before the launch AND you will receive one special item for in game use!  This prize applies to this level and all levels above it.

You will select the name of street in the game!  The streets in all major cities will be named by our generous $10 contributors.  \r\n\r\nThe Rules: You pick the name.  We verify that it is ok (not profane or copyrighted or racist, etc.) and fits in with our game themes.  We add it.  If we find a problem you pick a different name.  Not too difficult.

You can select the name of an NPC in the game.  It might be a quest giver, a shopkeeper, a town crier or maybe a guard on the wall.  \r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

You can select the name of a bar, a smithy, or another type of shop in the game world!  With multiple starter towns, villages, cities and capital cities part of the fun will be searching for the one with the name YOU picked!\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

One of the iconic statues that will populate the game will will be dedicated by you!  A small pop up plaque will declare the name you give to be a hero of the game world.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
A major ediface (a castle, bridge, etc.) will be named by you!\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

You will work with the designers to create an area of historical significance in the game.  This reward also applies to all levels above this one.  In order to assist us in keeping to our timetable you will be limited to one area and two suggestions as to the significance of the area.

A Healing Park will be named by you.  All Parks in the game will be areas in which players can go to be healed of damage for free.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

You will work with the developers to create your very own special enemy in the game!  Help create the bad guy and then go in game to crush him!  This reward also applies to all levels above it.  The character will have to work within the game rules, but you will also get to name it.  See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

Have an entire village named by you! In addition a small fictional piece will be told of how the person you name created the village that the town criers will explain to any player who asks.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
You can name a large town in the game!  Larger towns have more complex story lines that will mention the name you give. \r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
You will receive a large book with pictures of the concept artwork, early model renderings and the historical background of Oncolos.  This reward applies to all levels above this one.
You will choose the name of a large city in the game world.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
You will choose the name of a major highway in the game.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

You may choose the name for a historical mountain, gorge or canyon.  In addition, there will be a short piece about the legend of the feature that will be available from NPC's in the surrounding towns.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
Get an original piece of artwork from the game signed by the artist and framed.  Each piece will be a one of a kind work.

You get to select the name for an entire region in the game AND you get a unique piece of artwork from the game signed by the creator.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.

You will select the name for the NPC ruler of one of the four capital cites in Oncolos.  In addition you will receive the original art sketch which was the basis for the capital city that your designated character rules.\r\n\r\nNote: See The Rules under $10 Rewards governing picking names.
